title: The people of Flint said that their children could be taken away if they did not pay for toxic water in the city.
subtitle: One article claims that the company threatened to remove children affected by the Flint Water Crisis from their homes if families refused to pay for lead-contaminated water.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The people of Flint in Michigan have been threatened with the removal of their children if they refuse to pay for contaminated water.
